sentences.en: Bert is a voluble, gregarious man.
sentences.cn: 伯特是个能说会道、善于交际的人。

sentences.en: Both are gregarious earless seals. The male an inflatable , trunklike snout.
sentences.cn: 群居,两者均为无耳海豹. 因其身躯硕大,雄兽鼻粗壮能膨胀, 因而得名.

sentences.en: But she was gregarious and social, while I preferred books to parties.
sentences.cn: 她很合群, 擅长交际;而我宁愿呆在家里看书,也不愿出门参加什么聚会.

sentences.en: Except for hermits and recluses, who shun company, most people are gregarious.
sentences.cn: 除规避人群的隐士及遁世者外, 大部分人都是喜好群居的.

sentences.en: Gregarious locals everywhere dispense smiles like they're going out of style.
sentences.cn: 这儿至今还有海盗出没,这种情况在世界其它地方已经很少有了.

sentences.en: He says, the netizen accumulates gregarious capital on the network.
sentences.cn: 他说, 网友在网络上累积社交资本.

sentences.en: Holmes was gregarious, a great wit, a man of wide interests.
sentences.cn: 福尔摩斯爱交际，非常风趣，兴趣广泛。

sentences.en: Human beings are all gregarious , both tribal and racial.
sentences.cn: 在部落和种族之间人类生命都是群居的.

sentences.en: My dog, Holly, was a gentle, gregarious, well - behaved seven - year - old of mixed parentage.
sentences.cn: 我的混血狗霍莉7 岁, 它性情温和 、 合群 、 有礼貌.

sentences.en: Rodney was a cheerful, elegant and gregarious if rather contentious man.
sentences.cn: 罗德尼尽管非常喜欢与人争辩，却是个阳光、优雅、合群的人。

sentences.en: She is such a gregarious and outgoing person.
sentences.cn: 她很外向，喜欢交朋结友。

sentences.en: Snow geese are very gregarious birds.
The dragon by nature is a gregarious creature who wanders the earth.
sentences.cn: 龙生来是群居漫步地球上的动物.
这些动物非常喜欢群居.

sentences.en: They are gregarious birds and feed in flocks.
sentences.cn: 它们是群居鸟类，会集群觅食。

trans.tran_en: friendly and preferring to be with other people
